extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    kAG0 non-static methods in this class are not suitable for use by... anyone. really they should be killed.

                               boolean asSingleton)
        Get the SHA256 Hash of input
        Parameters:
        input - - the bytes to hash
        asSingleton - if true use a singleton MessageDigest instance, else create and destroy a MD instance just for this call.
        Returns:
        32 bytes that represent the SHA256 hash of input;
